OOUT.L.summary: Ocean Outdoor Limited provides digital out-of-home advertising services in the United Kingdom. Its portfolio of digital full motion screens facilitates connectivity as out-of-home, digital, mobile, online, and screen media to create deeper brand experiences. The company was formerly known as Ocelot Partners Limited and changed its name to Ocean Outdoor Limited in March 2018. Ocean Outdoor Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Road Town, the British Virgin Islands. Ocean Outdoor Limited is a subsidiary of SCP OCN Acquisition Lux S.a.r.l.
